short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allow ID information transfer from Guest Ban to IDfill PMS

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the Guest Ban IDfill Transfer Extension for Chrome - the ultimate tool for hoteliers and hospitality professionals. Guest Ban, renowned for its ID scanning capabilities in the hospitality sector, now offers an enhanced online guest management experience. With this extension, you can effortlessly scan guest IDs and synchronize them with your Property Management System (PMS) via IDfill. Whether you're checking in a guest or updating records, transfer data back to IDfill and ensure your PMS is always up-to-date.

Features:

Seamless ID Scanning: Use Guest Ban's state-of-the-art ID scanning for accurate guest data capture.
Instant Data Transfer: With a single click, transfer guest data from myguestban.com to IDfill, and subsequently to your PMS.
Secure & Reliable: Prioritize guest data security with encrypted transfers.
User-Friendly Interface: Easily log in to your myguestban.com app, view the guest details, and click on the IDfill transfer for immediate synchronization with your PMS.
Compatibility: Perfectly integrated with all versions of the IDfill Property Management System.
How to Use:

Install the Guest Ban IDfill Transfer Extension from the Chrome Web Store.
Log in to your myguestban.com app.
Browse and select the guest whose details you wish to transfer.
Click on the "IDfill Transfer" option.
The data will be instantly available in IDfill, ready to be synchronized with your PMS.
Support:
For any queries, technical issues, or assistance, please visit our support page or get in touch with our dedicated customer service team. www.guestban.com
